help: Creates the node on the left in the extent report. Use it just once in a central location, ideally in SetUp.
This will set one child node in the extent report right panel which is ideal for data driven tests.
Creates a node in the test report or a sub-node if you defined a scenario/child node already. If you want both a suite and test in this single step, use suite_name::test_name
Prints in the report as information.

step: |Report text | some text| and file link |http://someurl.png |
help: Example usage : You can give a video link for Playwright tests.
